SEARCH
Package gw.pl.currency

Class MonetaryAmounts

java.lang.Object
gw.pl.currency.MonetaryAmounts
public final class MonetaryAmounts extends Object
This class offers a collection of static methods designed to streamline financial operations, with a primary emphasis on currency conversions and summing amounts with implicit currency conversions, leveraging the MonetaryAmount class.

The methods in this class incorporate performance optimization by efficiently reusing exchange rates for currencies of the same type.

      Parameters:
      amountArray - The array of money objects to be converted.
      currency - The target currency code.
      Returns:
      A new array containing the converted amounts.

    • convertAndSum

      public static MonetaryAmount convertAndSum(MonetaryAmount[] amountArray, Currency currency, FXRateMarket market, Date marketTime, Currency baseCurrency)
      Utility method for converting arrays of MonetaryAmount objects based on specified parameters and aggregating the results using summation.
      Parameters:
      amountArray - The array of money objects to be converted.
      currency - The target currency code.
      market - The market rate type.
      marketTime - The effective market time.
      baseCurrency - The base currency.
      Returns:
      A MonetaryAmount representing the sum of the converted amounts in the target currency.

    • convertAndSum

      public static MonetaryAmount convertAndSum(MonetaryAmount[] amountArray, Currency currency)
      Utility method for converting arrays of MonetaryAmount objects based on specified parameters and aggregating the results using summation.
      Parameters:
      amountArray - The array of money objects to be converted.
      currency - The target currency code.
      Returns:
      A MonetaryAmount representing the sum of the converted amounts in the target currency.

    • convertAndReduce

      public static MonetaryAmount convertAndReduce(MonetaryAmount[] amountArray, Currency currency, FXRateMarket market, Date marketTime, Currency baseCurrency, BinaryOperator<MonetaryAmount> reduceOperator)
      Utility method for converting arrays of MonetaryAmount objects based on specified parameters and aggregating the results using a custom operation.
      Parameters:
      amountArray - The array of money objects to be converted.
      currency - The target currency code.
      market - The market rate type.
      marketTime - The effective market time.
      baseCurrency - The base currency.
      reduceOperator - The operator used to aggregate the converted amounts.
      Returns:
      The reduced value after converting the amounts. If the provided amountArray is null, it returns null. If amountArray is empty, it returns an MonetaryAmount instance with a value of zero and the currency set to the target currency.
